sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.role_management.inh_count.rest_api" name="Contextual Security: Role Management Enhancements REST API" version="1.0.0" state="published" help="Contextual_Security_InhCount_Plugin" provider_name="ServiceNow"> <description>Role Management Enhancements: prevent duplicate entries in sys_user_has_role for inherited roles, based on the value of the inh_count column</description> <requires> <import plugin="com.glide.role_management.inh_count"/> <import plugin="com.glide.scripted_rest_services"/> </requires> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Role Management Enhancements: prevent duplicate entries in sys_user_has_role for inherited roles, based on the value of the inh_count column</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Contextual_Security_InhCount_Plugin</help> <id>com.glide.role_management.inh_count.rest_api</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Contextual Security: Role Management Enhancements REST API</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.role_management.inh_count.rest_api/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.role_management.inh_count,com.glide.scripted_rest_services</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>le_management.inh_count.rest_api</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Contextual Security: Role Management Enhancements REST API
